authors: Chase me ladies, I'm the Cavalry

contactpage-license-request-group: Wikimedia chapter, thematic organisation, or user group & title (if any)
contactpage-license-request-use-note: Note: if we grant a trademark permission, we may list your use in a public list of authorised uses.
contactpage-pagetext-licenseabuse: Please use the form below to contact us about someone whom you suspect is abusing or misusing a Wikimedia trademark.
contactpage-affcom-user-group-location-l:
'''Location'''
* Please provide your country and city, so we can keep track of our user groups around the World. If global in reach, simply put "Internet".
contactpage-affcom-user-group-logo-wm-lo: ''If you wish to use the '''Wikimedia logo''', you may [[Special:Contact/requestlicense|request a trademark licence]].''
contactpage-movecom-signup-affiliation-g: Wikimedia organised group (WikiProject, community committee, etc.)
